metadata.description: Name of the custom Shodan Connector.
Enter the Shodan API Endpoint, Make sure to prefix with https:// e.g. https://api.shodan.io

properties.description: Shodan is a search engine for Internet-connected devices. It gathers information about all devices directly connected to the Internet. If a device is directly hooked up to the Internet, then Shodan queries it for various publicly available information. The types of devices that are indexed can vary from small desktops up to nuclear power plants and everything in between.

info.title: [parameters('ConnectorName')]
info.description: Shodan is a search engine for Internet-connected devices. It gathers information about all devices directly connected to the Internet. If a device is directly hooked up to the Internet, then Shodan queries it for various publicly available information. The types of devices that are indexed can vary tremendously, ranging from small desktops up to nuclear power plants and everything in between.

get.description: Returns all services that have been found on the given host IP.

parameters.name: history
parameters.description: Set true to return all historical banners.

parameters.name: minify
parameters.description: Set true to only return the list of ports and the general host information, no banners.

get.description: Search Shodan using the same query syntax as the website and use facets to get count for different properties.
Search Shodan using the same query syntax as the website and use facets to get summary information for different properties.
This method returns a list of facets that can be used to get a breakdown of the top values for a property.
This method returns a list of search filters that can be used in the search query.
This method lets you determine which filters are being used by the query string and what parameters were provided to the filters.
This method returns a list of port numbers that the crawlers are looking for.
This method returns an object containing all the protocols that can be used when launching an Internet scan.
Returns information about the Shodan account linked to this API key.
Get all the subdomains and other DNS entries for the given domain.
Look up the IP address for the provided list of domain names.
Look up the domain names that have been defined for the given list of IP addresses.
Get your current IP address as seen from the Internet.
Returns information about the API plan belonging to the given API key.
